meanings.definition: The soft, curly hair forming the coat of a sheep or similar animal.
meanings.sent1: The wools of the sheep felt warm and cozy.
meanings.sent2: She knitted a scarf using soft wools from the sheep.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous lamb played hide-and-seek in the wools of the flock.
meanings.sent4: The wools of the sheep embraced her like a fluffy blanket.
meanings.sent5: The wools of the sheep swayed gently in the breeze, a sight of pure comfort.

meanings.definition: Yarn or fabric made from the wool of sheep.
meanings.sent1: The store sold colorful wools for knitting sweaters.
meanings.sent2: She bought a skein of soft wools to crochet a blanket.
meanings.sent3: The wools in the shop whispered tales of sheep grazing in meadows.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity spun the wools of sheep into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The wools of sheep transformed into a cozy sweater, a labor of love.
